select abi.id, abi.school_id, abi.code, abi.user_id, abi.status, abi.create_date, abi.user_confirm_date, abi.school_confirm_date, ss.name as schoolName, ss.city, ss.province, ss.manage, ss.`level`, ss.school_type, ui.name as userName, ui.id_card, ui.birthday, ui.`type`, ui.sex, ui.images, ui.remark from apply_bill_info abi left join sys_school ss on (ss.id = abi.school_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = abi.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND ss.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{applyBillInfo.schoolName},'%')
AND ss.level LIKE CONCAT('%',#{applyBillInfo.level},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{applyBillInfo.userName},'%')
AND ui.id_card LIKE CONCAT('%',#{applyBillInfo.idCard},'%')
AND ss.user_id = #{applyBillInfo.schoolId}
AND ui.user_id = #{applyBillInfo.userId}
order by abi.create_date desc
